import React, { Component } from 'react' import Course from '../Components/Admin/Course' import User from '../Components/Admin/User' export default class Admin extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ course:false, user:false, } } handleChange=param=>{ this.setState({ course:true, user:false, [param]:true //hỏi lại }) } showMenu=()=>{ let {course,user}=this.state; if(course){ return } else if(user){ return } } render() { return (
